Class Unit

java.lang.Object
AssetTradingPlatform.Unit
public class Unit
extends java.lang.Object
A class to manage an OU (Organisational Unit) details and functions related to OUs

    • EditCredits

      public void EditCredits​(java.lang.String unitName, float creditAmount) throws java.lang.Exception
      Edit unit credits
      Parameters:
      unitName - Unit to remove from Check if admin (Does user have permission to perform action)
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - User doesnt have permission
      java.lang.Exception - Unitname doesnt exist
      java.lang.Exception - Cant set credits to negative
      See Also:
      Called to check that user performing edit has required admin privlidges

    • EditAssets

      public void EditAssets​(java.lang.String unitName, java.lang.String asset, float assetAmount) throws java.lang.Exception
      Edit unit assets
      Parameters:
      unitName - Unit to remove from Check if admin (Does user have permission to perform action)
      asset - Asset to modify
      assetAmount - Update quantity of asset to this amount
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - User doesn't have permission
      java.lang.Exception - Unit name doesn't exist
      java.lang.Exception - Cant set owned asset amount to negative
      java.lang.Exception - Asset not owned by unit
      See Also:
      Called to check that user performing edit has required admin privlidges
